content: This method requires permission to access the user's storage space. If the user has not granted permission, the method will return an error. ## Syntax ```js puter.fs.space() ``` ## Parameters None. ## Return value A `Promise` that will resolve to an object with the following properties: - `capacity` (Number): The total amount of storage capacity available to the user, in bytes. - `used` (Number): The amount of storage space used by the user, in bytes. ## Examples ```html
